title: No quarrying shall commence until the excavation plan is also approved by the Director of Geology and Mining, Government of Maharashtra
clause_text: No quarrying shall commence until the excavation plan is also approved by the Director of Geology and Mining, Government of Maharashtra.

source_pdf.filename: UDCPR Updated 30.01.25 with earlier provisions & corrections_compressed.docx
